insurance.title: Insurance Claims Processing
insurance.context: Streamline your insurance claims process by extracting key information from accident reports, damage claims, and medical forms.

security.title: Security and Surveillance
security.context: Enhance your security operations by automatically extracting data from CCTV footage, access logs, and incident reports.

financial.title: Financial Services
financial.context: Simplify financial document processing by extracting key data from bank statements, invoices, and tax returns.

invoice.title: Automated Document Processing
invoice.context: Streamline your invoice processing by automatically extracting key information from various invoice formats.

identity.title: Identity Verification
identity.context: Enhance your identity verification process by automatically extracting and validating information from various ID documents.

brands.title: Brand Logo Detection
brands.context: Identify and analyze brand logos in images to track brand presence and marketing effectiveness.
